website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for gamers who play on PC and multiple consoles, as it’s compatible with all of them.
pros: Ultra-comfortable with padded headband and cushioned ear cups
Superior voice clarity thanks to mic’s noise-cancelling technology
Gamers enjoy a fully immersive gaming experience with surround sound
Bonus points for Mac OS compatibility, which can be challenging to find
cons: Advertised with 7.1 surround sound, but some consumers say it’s only simulated as opposed to an authentic 7.1 surround sound experience

customer_reviews.title: Best Headset I Own!
customer_reviews.text: As an I.T. person, I have owned and used a lot of headsets. I found this one to be the best by far. First off, it is extremely comfortable. Since I use it a work it makes those long conference calls and video meetings easier to deal with. In addition, the other people on my calls have told me how clear and crisp my voice sounds. Since I work in a corporate office, they are also excellent at reducing/eliminating the outside noise that goes on around me. If someone tries to talk to me when I am wearing them I cannot hear the person at all. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L. Judy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because of the reviews, I have always paid more then 4 times this amount for a set of gaming headphones. I took the chance and bought these with a mind set of if they don’t work good I didn’t spend much. I will tell you these things work just as good and even better then some of the way more expensive brands! I am not disappointed at all and will be buying another pair for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I am super impressed with this headset. The build quality is great and the surround sound is awesome. Works great on PC and PS4. Mic quality is good and can be adjusted. Headset is very light and has a long cable. Overall, I love these headphones and would definitely reccomend them.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Headphones were great...while they lasted. Around a week ago I started to hear static occasionally from one side, but I just ignored it since it went away. Today they completely broke. I cannot hear anything but static and no one can hear me. I tried it in different USB ports from my PC and laptop to confirm it was the headphones itself. Really disappointed that it only lasted 3 months to the day.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: For $21 (lightening deal) I'd certainly get these again. I took off a star because: Although more than adequate the sound quality isn't that good (a $20 pair of earbuds is certainly better). Also the "7.1" is a misrepresentation. This implies they are 7 drivers plus a subwoofer. There's certainly no subwoofer in a headphone and there's only two drivers. I say I'd buy them again: Easy plug and play with Win 10. The fit and finish is nice as well as the cord feels very nice. They're lightweight and reasonably comfortable for an hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: 4 out of 5 potatoes
customer_reviews.text: So first off. These gaming headphones for the price are pretty great. Sound quality isnt bad. They are pretty comfortable. I wish the earpads were just a little thicker. They fit me well and I have a big head. So that is a definite plus. The 7.1 is simulated surround sound. Which is a bit of a let down. It doesnt say that anywhere on the page that I can see. The mic is abysmal. My friends said I sound like I'm talking through a tin can. Luckily I have a separate mic that I use for discord and recording purposes, but all around the are worth the money. If anything changes I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Fayt

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Happy overall
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. The noise cancellation is great, they are pretty comfortable, sound quality is just as good as any higher priced headset, and the mic picks up clearly even when there is some background noise. I have no complaints. If anything ever happens, I will purchase these again. I love that it is just the USB port plug, no dongle, splitter, or 3.5 jack to deal with. I also really love the in-line volume control and mute switch. Makes it convenient and fast for me to use when I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Williams

customer_reviews.title: Complete trash.
customer_reviews.text: Complete trash. I ended up returning the first one and getting a replacement hoping I just got the one bad one they had that day,.....but the second wasn't any better. I tried to use this headset for calling over my computer and 9/10 times people said I was breaking up, sounded like I was under water, or sounded like I was at the bottom of a trash can. Good for sound, but the microphone is trash. Who wants to spend that much money on a headset if the microphone is trash?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up; very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought the EKSA Gaming Headset with 7.1 Surround Sound Stereo for language learning, rather than gaming. I figured that a headset set up for clear distinct sound in gaming would be perfect for my needs, and I was correct. This headset (I bought the gray one) is truly PnP, automatically loading drivers and ready to going in a very short time. Sound quality is excellent, which was particularly important to me since I have partial hearing loss. During my language lessons, pronunciations are clear and precise; the microphone picks up my voice quite well, with the language software recognizing my voice and pronunciations without issue. Good headset; better value.
customer_reviews.author: LTC LDD

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t connect to controller
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty decent headset and all. easy setup. However, the fact that it doesn’t connect to the controller itself makes it pretty useless for a lot of people. I don’t sit very close to my PS4 and it’s super inconvenient for the cord to be short. I can’t move my PS4 closer to me. This headset is only good for people who sit right next to their PS4. Pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: $15 USB Headset Mic for $40 - HURTS AFTER AN HOUR - Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: No airflow for ears. They hurt after an hour. Wouldn't even make use as comfy earmuffs, although your ears will stay warm. Sound is fine (7.1 is a lie), mic is the bare minimum functionality. They work. Very cheaply made though. Don't pay $40 for these. It isn't worth it. I missed the return window. :( In a world where USB mics are the minority, it is wise to inflate the price by 500%. It's good business for a lousy product. Well done, China.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M.

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING: NOT NOISE CANCELLING
customer_reviews.text: After sending back my first set because the mic just didn't work at all after the first day, I was told by my friends that the mic was picking up a lot of background noise. I even tested the sound levels which picked up someone whispering 5 feet away from me. The sound quality is fine, but I would not have purchased these had they not been advertised as noise cancelling. Also, nowhere on the actual packaging does it state the mic is noise cancelling. I know you get what you pay for, but I just figured these would get me through a few months until I can get a better set, but the mic is deal-breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 🌈 Rainbow Swirls appeal to the Girl!🌈
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have a built in mic to a headset! Been in constant use for a while now, and it's the headphones of choice on virtual calls! Doesn't look dorky! Super squishy and comfortable pads! Could use a little more bass, but we don't use it for gaming. Mainly just music. It IS really balanced though! Volume capabilities are great! Because my husband has used it so frequently for zoom calls, it's great to have an onboard functional mute button rather than having to remember to mute!
customer_reviews.author: Abswclfx

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy the surround audio
customer_reviews.text: So far this headset has been working amazing for me, the audio quality is really good. I felt a bit skeptical at first but I was really interested in a surround headset, and it really does make a difference. I have only used it on PC of course so I couldn't tell you how it works on the PS4. The noise canceling might be it's weakest feature but it holds out. But overall it really gives a rich sound, and it's been pretty immersive for me. The lights are nice enough, the over the ear cushions are comfortable and its not hard to adjust. There's room for improvement but I've enjoyed this headset a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa G

customer_reviews.title: Best headset for WAH
customer_reviews.text: I am currently working from home. The headset that was recommended to do my job was a logitech headset. However because I wear glasses after an hour if wear they become uncomfortable as they do not fully cover my ears. Ordered these bad boys and wow. Not only do they provide full ear coverage, but they are soft, I can wear for 8+ hours, the color is cool and for the most part the noise cancelling works. However if you have a screening toddler the noise cancelling does not work LOL. Overall decent headset for the price and full coverage ear protection
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headset
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter because our cat keeps chewing her cords. The cord is nylon wrapped so no more damage from our pica cat. She loves the noise cancelling aspect as well and no longer hears all the noise in the house while she plays her games and talks with friends. We have tried all kinds of headsets and even my husband (who is super picky about over the ear headsets) loves how the padding around the ears is placed and is going to be ordering the blue tooth ones and I may order a pair for myself as well soon.
customer_reviews.author: jebes

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for podcast recording
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset to use for my podcast recording. I think the sounds is pretty darned good for the price. I uploaded a quick video I where I recorded the audio so you can hear how it sounds. Not too bad if you ask me. Overall very comfortable and I like the rope cable covering.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice headset
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset for home office use during COVID-19 because the built in microphone went bad on my webcam. It works great for Skype, GoToMeeting and Microsoft Teams video conferencing. The headset is well built, comfortable to wear and looks sharp. The plug and play USB input and 7.1 surround sound is a huge improvement over older style stereo headphones that use a 3.5mm plug that has to be run through a splitter cable. The heavy duty braided cable is a nice and long, so it should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Usb, good microphone, good price
customer_reviews.text: I just received these yesterday but they are fantastic and I am so happy with my purchase. Long story short, I realized, after years of using another headset, that the microphone on it was not picking up my voice. And actually never had! The headset only had an aux connection and as I had to plug it into the headphone jack, it had never been picking up my voice, my laptop mic had instead. So I ordered this set specifically for the usb connection. Which has not only solved my problem, but actually gone above in beyond in that it is actually a very nice set with a pretty decent microphone. Highly recommend it when coupled with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Great product a must buy for gamers
customer_reviews.text: I have had plenty of turtle beach headsets and the cord for them always has just the rubber coating it always breaks or crack and the quality or hearing people on chat is always low unless you spend double the price of this headset I’m 100% satisfied with this eksa headset great product cancelled outside noise perfectly I can hear my friends talking over the sound of the game and all around sound quality is great shipping was faster than estimated I have absolutely no complaints will definitely be purchasing eksa headsets only from now on
customer_reviews.author: scott taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable, poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I got these in hopes of replacing my PC gaming headset and I feel a bit let down. The headband is not soft at all, it's actually quite hard. The ear fit is odd and uncomfortable. Those two things factored in with the "seashell" effect (putting your ear to a shell to hear the ocean) has made this really not worth the time waiting for the delivery or the money. In addition to all of that, if you are prone to rashes or have sensitive skin, this really isn't the headset for you.
customer_reviews.author: B. Villeda

customer_reviews.title: Great headset, exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have other bluetooth headsets but they always have noise bleed from my environment. This headset has a dedicated mic that is right up against your face and helps block out unwanted noise. My friends on zoom said they can hear me a lot better. It is good for covering your whole ear so that you don't hear your surroundings as well. The RGB lights on the earpieces are a nice touch. The headband is adjustable and works for people with a large head like me XD
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: No AUX - Only USB Connection
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking headset. From the color changing lining to the overall build of it. These feel pretty legit being @ that lower price point. Sound quality? On point especially since you have to plug it straight into your console.. UGH!! Read up on the details because there is NO AUX to connect it to your controller. Nor does it have any sort of wireless function. IMHO, grab a slightly cheaper set with the cords you need.
customer_reviews.author: KrissyVibes

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, in this case an inexpensive product that works, but not awesomely
customer_reviews.text: I wanted headphones for work and occasionally gaming. They are NOT noise canceling at all. The mic is weird, my co-workers can hear me at times and I cannot bend the mic any close to my mouth. If I had to do this over again I might have went up a few bucks and got something better (at least would hope to) but I was not looking to break the bank. So I got what I paid for, just wish it was a little better for what I did pay.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Wolman

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review
customer_reviews.text: These sounded much better than I was expecting for the price. Purchased these to use with a VOIP program on my Macbook. They worked and sounded great for the first month, and then they stopped working properly. They started making a strange high pitched sound every 3-5 seconds that doesn't stop. Can't use them at all anymore. Update - I wrote these off as a bad purchase, but then the company contacted me through email after seeing my initial review. They sent a new set that arrived in 2 days and the new headset is working great.
customer_reviews.author: JRay

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I will be honest. I work with audio, I have used some of the best headphones in the industry when it comes to audio quality. This is by far lacking in the audio quality category, it sounds like a cheap 99 cent store value headset. The mid frequencies are overpowering and FLAT, there's minimal bass so you don't get a theater sound at all . It looks great, feels amazing. But none of that matters if I can NOT get beyond how poor the sound is.
customer_reviews.author: E & J Push'n wind

customer_reviews.title: Def not gaming but they work
customer_reviews.text: I have a HyperX Cloud II for my gaming. I got these for work. These are cheap and the quality is obvious. Sound cancelling doesnt really exist with these. I could hear everything still. The ear pieces are not very deep and hurt my ears after an hour. The sound is exactly what you would expect a cheap headset to sound like. If you are on a budget sure these will work but I would just save up and get a good quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Heirio

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Old headset broke, so I ordered a new one pretty quickly. Never heard of the brand before, so I was kinda skeptical, but they turned out great. Good sound quality giving a surround-sound feel, and solid build quality. Mic seems good, too, and the volume slider is really handy on PS4 when you can't adjust the audio output levels at all times. My only complaint is that it's a bit short, shorter than my old pair, so I had to move my PS4 a bit more out of it's place to get enough slack. Would highly recommend, otherwise. Oh, and the aesthetic is quite nice, especially the rainbow glowing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: These headphones caused me to become nauseous and gave me headaches. The muffs on these headphones were too big. The muffs pressed against the space between my ears and my mandible. That pressure made me feel like I was under water thereby causing nausea and dizziness. I gave the headphones to a deserving young man and bought another pair from another brand. These were not for me.
customer_reviews.author: JAPERA

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months. Not noise canceling
customer_reviews.text: These headphones stopped working after 2 months. I bought two brand new for work and home schooling. Now I have to find another headset for myself and daughter. Dont waste your money. Another thing this is NOT NOISE CANCELING.
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle

customer_reviews.title: Buy Now!
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Easy to use. They are very comfortable and light. Would recommend you purchase these. Great value!! **EDIT** 2-6-20 The company told me if I left a review they would ship me a free gift. I stand by my review, I really enjoy them. However, I am not happy about the honesty about the company. Hopefully I will not have to file a claim, because they do not reply to emails. Not the best way to promote.
customer_reviews.author: The Wrights

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset especially for the price point. The only minor issue if you find it to be one is they aren’t completely noise cancelling (to the wearer) and sounds can be heard outside the headset. But for me, that’s a pro, I need to be able to hear what’s going on inside my house while I’m playing so I like being able to still hear out of them. Also, great noise cancellation for those you’re playing with. My tv can be blaring and my friends can’t hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Moneka Rodriquez

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: The mic quality is pretty good and the cord is pretty durable. However, it’s comfort leaves something to be desired; I’m not sure if I have a big head but after about an hour of gaming it starts to hurt the sides of my head and often get a headache from it. They aren’t as flexible as shown above, I tried twisting and bending them and it maybe got 1/4 of the way before I thought it would break. The dial for the sound is also very small and sensitive so I have to adjust it quite often.
customer_reviews.author: sports 485

customer_reviews.title: Best Headset so far
customer_reviews.text: Wow, looks and plays good! I’ll be switching from the PlayStation Gold to EKSA. The Gold hurt my ears to HEAVY. Wonderful packaging, didn’t expect it in fancy little bag inside. One thing I would change from packaging is have the box bagged or something I had to take the shipping label off the box. Other than that, for the price not bad. Wish there was more colors to this model. Will be getting another one soon for my PC. This one is for the PS4 Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: IJAZZI

customer_reviews.title: High Quality & Performance
customer_reviews.text: My sons, 21 & 9, are avid gamers and said these headphones are the same sound quality as Turtle Beach headphones. They could hear details in the game that they didn't hear with other headphones like their character's footsteps. These headphones come very well packaged and are made with sturdy materials, high quality. They are actually lightweight for their size. The earpieces are very comfortable. The lighting is multicolor and very cool looking, but not so bright that it's annoying. I just purchased them, so I'm not sure about malfunction over time, but given the quality they are made from and high performance I expect them to last quite a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headset, made to last. Mic is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have using this since last 10days and so far they are excellent. The sound quality is really good and the noise cancellation is awesome. They are pretty comfortable as well although they do feel a tad bit heavy but I'm sure I will get used to them. I like the Lights on them but I won't be using that at all. Overall, I am very satisfied with my purchase. You can't go wrong with the price of these for playing video games. The Mic is perfect as well
customer_reviews.author: Tarun Jeswani

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, looks nice. Breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great. It cancels noise nicely. However they do feel heavy. I’m on the phone 8 hours a day and my ears hurt by the time I’m done. I also feel like I have a pretty big head but they are always slipping even when they are as small as they can go. UPDATE: I’ve had these less than a month and it already broke. I’m extremely careful with my stuff and even have a great headset stand I use constantly.
customer_reviews.author: HippieGirl

customer_reviews.title: Detailed sound
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted these because they were green. I liked them because they promised sound optimization. In the end, we were both happy with the quality of the product and performance with our games. Mic is clear, ear cups isolate noise fit and adjustability are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Updated) The service team is really awesome!
customer_reviews.text: (Updated review) My headset's microphone became dead 50-ish days after purchase. I left a review complaining about the problem. The service team of the product left an note on my previous review that I could request service for my headset. So, I proceeded with the service request. Responses were very quick and communications were easy. The team was eager to help me resolve my issue. Because I experienced very nice service, I upgraded my review.
customer_reviews.author: grandstar

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love the provided pouch! It’s a great feature for transporting or storing the headphones when not in use! Another great feature is the provided Velcro chord tie! Makes keeping excess chord contained a breeze! My only major con is that there is no software support to control any sound features like the 7.1 surround or any effects. You have to use windows features for that control option. Using DTS mode though, let me tell you... whew! Awesome! 😂😂 Noise cancelling on the mic stand alone does not do much at all, but when paired with discord or another voice app, it works. All in all a sturdy option for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Howard H

customer_reviews.title: Sound awesome and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are perfect for gaming on the PS4 plus. Just hook up to the USB and off you go for true surround sound. It makes a huge difference I think especially in modern warfare online to hear where shots are coming from and foot steps around you. I think they are pretty comfy and are big enough to go around my whole ear and not to mention the leds are pretty cool as well. Also the noise cancelling is great. I can't even here my PS4 pro trying to take off when playing graphic intense games.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly williams

customer_reviews.title: Good noise cancellation and good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: They got these for my daughter so she can use them for gaming and for school during distance learning.in a room with other siblings you can easily do or work without hearing what they're doing and the microphone picks up well for talking to her class.they also have really good base and sound in general for listening to music or doing gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Mn poet 09

customer_reviews.title: Bad build quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid for the price, but one thing that stood out to me was the microphone wasn’t glued in place properly, with just adjustment of the microphone the whole boom came out of the headset. It’s pretty annoying, considering it should have been glued correctly from the factory, but still works. Sounds quality isn’t amazing, but for the money sounds fine. Overall comfortable, and easy to use 2 week update: microphone broke and doesn't work anymore, have no idea whats wrong with it. just save you money for something name brand
customer_reviews.author: Rohan Au

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great sound
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about it being "7.1 surround sound", but the sound is really great. The ear cups and headband are very comfortable to wear. The sides light up. The cord is braided and generously long and comes with an attached velcro cord wrap. The cord also has controls for the volume and turning the microphone on and off, which is great! I love these headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Kymberly

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for elearning, it was a great buy, these work with Microsoft teams and help the kids isolate the noise in the room allowing them to concentrate, granted these are not noise canceling headphones but the design allows that, sound quality is great and the fact that they plug in via USB with a extra long cable makes it easy to use for them
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Fits my big ears!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had a problem with over-ear headphones because some parts of my ear always ended up getting squished which leads to me not being able to play comfortably for long periods of time. I am happy to say that I finally found a pair that will comfortably cover my entire ear and I had no issues playing for extended periods of time. The sound and everything are great as I would expect in a gaming headphone and even though I can't see the lights while playing, the fact that it lights up is super cool.
customer_reviews.author: spt

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good headset, for gaming or otherwise. The sound quality is bad, when using the microphone there is an insane amount of static to the point my friends cant hear me over it. uncomfortable on my head. not worth it, currently returning.
customer_reviews.author: Karin D.

customer_reviews.title: This mom is now ignored.
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve marked this review down because my son can’t hear me when I’m talking to him now. LOL but I guess for gaming noise cancelling is important so that’s a good thing then. My son loves these. He likes the light up light ! Mic works great too. Solid purchase. Son is happy. I’m happy even if I find myself talking to myself more haha
customer_reviews.author: M Tran

customer_reviews.title: Can ise with console but not controller
customer_reviews.text: Said it would fit the ps4 but in order for that to happen would need a converter, or to plug in directly to playstation 4 console itself, i unfortunately don't want to be standing by my console while i play. I do thank the company itself for reaching out to me and justifying the problem. They were great to work with it in rectifying the issue, but i still wouldn't use this headset for a ps4.
customer_reviews.author: Kearra Prewitt-O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Impressed so far
customer_reviews.text: Headphones came in a vinyl bag embossed with the company logo. The item is a good weight, doesn't feel cheap at all, the earpads and headband are a nice soft foam cushion covered by a soft vinyl overall a good feel. The audio has a good tone, the bass is the right pitch. I've not been able to test it for the voice portion of it, I will as soon as I have the chance One thing I was a bit disappointed with is the mic. A 360 or 180 mic rotation would be great on this headset, but a120 will do.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Shamp

customer_reviews.title: My gamer kids love these
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boys to use for school and for gaming. They love these headphones. My youngest is 12 and very picky and he said these fit great! I actually bought two different brands and they decided to send the other brand back to get a second pair of these. They loved the color changing lights too.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: This headset is perfect for playing videogames and for recording videos. The microphone and speakers aren't out of this world but they are still better than I expected for the price. They are nice to wear for a long time and the led lights on both sides are a really nice touch. Overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great overall product
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is just like other cheap gaming headsets that I've tried. The single USB plug is very convenient. It provides both audio and power connection, unlike other gaming headsets that have both the headphone jack for audio and the USB plug for power. The foam is very comfortable, it sits nicely around my ear. Adjusting the ear muffs isn't as smooth as other headphones but I'll see if it's because it's new. The headphones are a bit tight for my head so it gives me a headache after a few hours. The mic sounds robotic according to my friends and that other low cost headphones have better mic.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Mina

customer_reviews.title: Very good headset
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this headset. It got good reviews, but until you try it yourself, you don’t know whether it is just OK or it is really good. This headset is really good! The sound is clear and precise, the cord is long and has a woven sheath to protect it, the padding feels comfortable over long periods and provides a good acoustic seal to block out other noise. I also appreciate the boom mic design which doesn’t get in the way, but picks up my voice clearly. I had intended to just use this for video conferencing, but now enjoy listening to streaming music. Looking forward to gaming with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old son is serious about some games and loves to converse with his friends while playing teams. He loves them and he definitely can't hear me even when I walk into his room and say his name fairly loud LOL. They have an easy mute button which you can press. This comes in handy cause he can mute it so his friends can't hear him when I come in there to ask him a question. So, essentially, it's great for kids and parents
customer_reviews.author: atallums

customer_reviews.title: Bad for both sound and and mic
customer_reviews.text: With discord or any other software occasionally I will sound like a chipmunk and echos real badly. I have to unplug and replug in the device. On "normal" sessions I sound low quality to others or when I record videos like I'm in auditorium or stadium. Additionally the speakers sound nice but on occasion the everyone will sound distance and like in an auditorium as well. I'm force to unplug and replug it back in. I'll keep these for backup but these are awful headset. Do not buy. The ONLY good point is its very comfortable and the cord is decently long for my PC use. But still don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Fantuzzo

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece
customer_reviews.text: Overall these are worth every penny. I did a few test on them with my buds in discord and playing Warzone. The only thing I have complaint on is the bass. I don’t think it’s high enough. But also have to think I game with a set that has bass control and vibration for more effect so I can not compare apples to bananas. But I would definitely recommend to anyone starting out.
customer_reviews.author: CRoberson

customer_reviews.title: Bomb.com
customer_reviews.text: I work from home the other headsets I bought kept breaking and hurt after wearing for awhile these are built to wear for extended periods of time eg for gamers - the quality is A1 sauce - the design is built to last thank you and it even has iOS tags on it so it’s made really well - I’m going to buy a couple more for back up just in case
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not good for using in a party.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset for my boyfriend. It had incredible sound quality if you’d want it just for music or to hear your games. However, the mic on the one that I recieved had terrible quality, it sounded as if you had a loud fan in the background. I have bought several headsets over the years, this one has a fantastic design. It just wasn’t up to par for a gaming mic.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This headset is an absolutely amazing value. I was blown away by the clarity and sound quality, and it's extremely comfortable to wear. Not too heavy, not too light - the earcups are breathable, and the headband is padded, which is a nice touch. It made it through a long video conference and was still comfortable. The microphone is amazing - sound recording is clear and it neutralizes the background sound in my apartment, a necessity during the pandemic. The RGB lighting is a nice touch as well. Absolutely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Very good product but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my daughter to use for school but she just uses the computer speakers so I know use it for work. It looks cool, is comfortable, and works well. Maybe too well, it blocks out sound so well that I have trouble hearing my own voice and it makes me feel like others can’t hear me even though they can. It would be nice to be able to hear my voice through the headphones themselves to have a more natural conversation.
customer_reviews.author: joaquin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: It has amazing sound quality and I didn’t even notice when my roommates were blasting music just outside of my headphones so that says something about the noise cancellation. Also, they’re very stylish and you may be tempted to take many selfies because of the glowing rainbow on your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Sound and feel great!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great! They fit comfortably, produce great sound quality, and the mic is great for any calls I have to go on. The cushion that goes on the top of my head is the softest thing I have ever felt.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan M

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good However simulated surround sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the first headset. After registering for the warranty I received an email from customer support telling if I left a comment they would send me another headset. I completed a review of the headset and 10 or so days later a second headset was delivered as a customer appreciation gift. I would purchase this headset again for use in my classes, the simulated surround sound does sound good.
customer_reviews.author: Ritchie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great audio and microphone  quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I work for technical support. I constantly have to be on zoom meetings or calls. So I have need to have good audio and microphone quality. I am very satisfied with the quality. I would recommend buying this headphones. Just make sure that you only use them for computer as it only connects through USB. It does not have 3.5 mm cable.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Bought these for working from home where I am taking calls via VOIP. The noise canceling is a great feature as are the in line mute and volume. The light up on the side which is just a cute detail. The cord is reinforced with braiding for durability.
customer_reviews.author: Becky A.

customer_reviews.title: Not For PC! Bad mic!!
customer_reviews.text: Great look. Comfortable indeed. Easy to set up and use. However, the way it sounded to others no matter what game I was playing or chat system used the sound was terrible. Echoed, a lot of breaking up and a lot of static noises. I researched how to fix the issue and tried everything but to no avail. These are not worth it. By the way, I tried it on my laptop so I don’t know if it works for other platforms but this is a no go for laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: RGB headset
customer_reviews.text: The only reason that I gave the 4 stars is because I have a little discomfort wearing these for too long... the RGB is noticeably good but I like my other headsets more.. good buy if you’re looking for a cool looking headset.. if you are a heavy gamer I would think about other options.
customer_reviews.author: Sajja Satya Chandra Prasad

customer_reviews.title: Sound cuts out constantly.
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied with these headphones. They're comfortable and the sound quality is good - when it works. Which it frequently does not. I've used them a few times to attend virtual meetings and after the second time, it became increasingly difficult to find a position for the cord that did not cause the sound to cut out multiple times a second - to the point where speech became unintelligible. This happens with multiple people across different platforms; the only common factor is these headphones. Spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor K.

customer_reviews.title: Decent enough headset but low quality audio
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Comfortable. Plug and Play. All that is fine. However, the audio quality is very poor. My other headset was around this price range (actually cheaper) and I noticed an immediate difference in the audio quality upon using these. It's not so bad that it's unusable, but if you're coming from another headset with good audio, you will absolutely notice the drop. Oh, and the microphone quality is worse than my previous headset as well. All in all, I'm not happy with this purchase. I paid more and got a lower quality product. Good chance I'll be returning it. 2/5
customer_reviews.author: K. Stowers

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, But ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this headphone. I am not using it for gaming. I only need it for telephone conference via Laptop (Skype). The only wish I had is "I wish the cord is detachable" That would have been sooooooo great. The sound quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Akintoye Odumakinde

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment I've Made!
customer_reviews.text: This headset is amazing! I'd dare say it's ranked right up there with the famous "Turtle Beach" headsets in my opinion. I bought these specifically just to play the new "COD: Modern Warfare" and the sound quality is perfect you can hear everything from the feet running to a shell casing dropping after being shot. For me the noise cancelling is A1, they're extremely comfortable to wear for a long period of time (+1 for the hardcore gamers out there) and I mean c'mon the lights around the edges: icing on the cake! I could go on and on but I'd run outta room. Just go ahead and buy them and see for yourself you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: edgar

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for the price point...I needed a new set of headphones because the ones I had crapped out and I didn't have the budget to get really spendy on a new set. These have really good sound for the price -- the high end treble seems a touch flat, but the surround sound works great and they sound really good. The volume control is on the cord rather than on the headphones themselves, which I'd rather have them on the headphones but it's honestly no big deal. I'm really happy with them, they're a good replacement and I didn't have to spend a lot of money! :D
customer_reviews.author: Michael Robison

customer_reviews.title: That Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy a gaming headset, but did not want to go way overboard on the price or type. So i did some searching and came upon these. I ordered them, they arrived, plugged them in and starting playing my game. Immediately i was blown away by the great sound quality. These things for the price are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: El Gordo Tejano

customer_reviews.title: Worth it :)
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for a few weeks now and absolutely love it. Works well with my laptop and the noise Canceling is awesome, I’ve talked on discord and was told that with the headphones is a better crisp sound than the laptop microphone. It’s very comfortable on the ears and the glowing lights is charming. USB plug in is easy peasy better than having to work with two aux plugs. The chords are durable af, my puppy tries to chew on it now and then.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah supit

customer_reviews.title: Good headset!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a USB headset for video conferencing, and this headset works great! I'm using it on a Mac, no issues at all, plugged it in and it works fine. Sound is very good, the headset is very comfortable, even while wearing glasses. I am very happy with this headset!
customer_reviews.author: Rich P

customer_reviews.title: Great audio, bad mic
customer_reviews.text: So first off, the sounds quality is pretty nice, they're nice and loud and they fit really well on my head and ears. If that's all it was, I would give it 5 stars. However, the mic isn't the best. I play games with my friends and use Discord and they instantly noticed a difference. They said it sounded like I was using a phone to talk, which is not exactly a good thing. So overall, if you're buying these for audio and head feel, these will be a good choice. But if you plan on using the mic as well, just know the mic quality is on the low end.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lons

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for 6 weeks and the microphone has broken and I had to superglue it in and now the cord is screwing up and my audio cuts in and out. Do not buy!!!! Go with a better quality!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 13yo nephew & he loves them. He immediately started using them when they arrived & said they were great. Fast forward a few weeks later & he’s still telling me how great they are & that he uses them all the time. They were definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Klg

customer_reviews.title: Not for PlayStation.
customer_reviews.text: Says it’s for PlayStation and many other consoles. Realistically it’s not for PlayStation at all. You have to connect the headset to the console not the controller. 👎 who wants to be tethered to you console? It’s one thing to have your headset attached to the controller but to the console ? Uh no. Had to return. I’m they do look cool and felt comfortable when I put them on. Not for PlayStation
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Really like this headset. Been using it for work and play, and am very happy with it. It's plug and play on both PC and Mac computers. During video conferences, people on the other end tell me the mic sounds very clear. Speakers sound great and the handy cord-mounted volume control works well. Overall, I'm totally happy with this purchase. The price is right, the quality is there, and it just works.
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: Can't complain
customer_reviews.text: It's affordable and gets the job done. I love the RGB lights and the mic worked very well. And its as easy as plugging in the USB. For a person that hates wearing a headset in general, this was not bad especially for gaming. Also, it comes packed pretty nicely. It comes in a faux leather bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 headsets. First one I ordered was in a nice box with filler, Second arrived like it had been mauled, third one no packaging at all, just a label stuck on the outside of the box. They were all ordered at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hallmark

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, instructions need correcting
customer_reviews.text: Does work with all gaming systems, however it leaves out the fact that it must be plugged into the system directly. For the ps4 the instructions show it plugged into the remote but words say otherwise which made no sense whatsoever. Noise cancellation is alright, not the best but doable. Decent sound quality. Tl;dr instructions say one thing, images say another.
customer_reviews.author: Mbolin

customer_reviews.title: One of the best 7.1 headphones I have used.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for gaming and work from home meetings becuase needed the 7.1 for gaming and noise cancelling feature for meetings. The headphone is built to last and braided cable is very sturdy. Accidentally ran the cable over with computer chair few times but nothing has happaned to cable. The sound quality is amazing playing games and watching HD movies on computer.
customer_reviews.author: Kalpesh

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my brother
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my brother. He is a gamer and his favorite color is green. A friend recommended these for him. He loves them. They work perfect for noise canceling and communication while playing video games
customer_reviews.author: tiana

customer_reviews.title: Stops working suddenly. Customer support non-existant
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these ear phones. One of them only 1 ear piece works, the mic works, and the other both ear piece work, but the mic doesnt work. I called amazon, they said its not covered, so I contacted the company selling it. They asked for typical questions. And never heard back., its been over a month. I bought these in may, stopped working early september.
customer_reviews.author: Issy

customer_reviews.title: Great budget 7.1 surround headset!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! I didn’t expect that the sound quality on this will be great.... audio from the mic is clear, the 7.1 surround is great for a budget headset like this, i would put this one step below my kraken ultimate.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Dabu / Forged Garage

customer_reviews.title: not so great
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace another set and they sounded horrible. For the price i expected at least something decent. Sound was muffled no where near stereo quality. No mater the EQ setting i put it was horrible. Mic was just the same as other players said I sounded muffled. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Borias

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really cute looking when they light up. Sound quality is great! Easy to set up and great for pc gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t need 3.4 mm headphone Jack
customer_reviews.text: In the head side there is a foam which is so comfortable and comes with 7.1 sorround sound. Just plug USB it works mic and lights with usb port which is nich feature. Amazing sound Qulaity.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Naya

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for distance learning because my son is doing it at daycare. The noise cancelling is very helpful so he can focus better. They’re super, soft and comfortable. The lights are very nice and my son loves this headset.
customer_reviews.author: misskimmie1886

customer_reviews.title: Good quality headset, RGB lights are great!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for 2 weeks, and they are very nice for the price point. The USB cord is braided and very nice. Microphone quality is fantastic and I’ve been very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Carson Backus

customer_reviews.title: High quality for budget pricing
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these headphones blew me away for the price. High-quality gaming headphones at budget pricing. Buy these now if you are looking to upgrade your gaming experience. Especially because they are PC and PS4 compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Newcomb

customer_reviews.title: Works...for a short time
customer_reviews.text: This headset is comfortable, great noise canceling. I have beenusing it as a headset for a work from home call center job. I realize that is not what this headset is designed for but I needed one that would not hurt my ears for 10 hours per day. I have had this headset for about a month and today it stopped working. I have no way to return it at this point and am going to have to buy a different headset now.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Broadway

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Desktop Gamer
customer_reviews.text: I play my PS4 on the same desk I use for work, who doesn't love good ergonomics The headset reaches my PS4 delivers quality sound when I'm playing games and need to keep it down but I still want to fully enjoy the audio experience
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to gaming. Noise cancelation is better than other products. The sound quality is really high. Inuse with my Alienware laptop and I play lot games. It has light that combines with the laptop. Looks really good.
customer_reviews.author: ph

customer_reviews.title: Already broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs for my remote schoolers. So we have used these headphones for less than 30 days. Both microphones have already broken and we have taped them up to get through the week and now today my son's stopped working altogether in the middle of class. No changes to settings. Just stopped working. I would not recommend these headphones. Do your research, please! Now I'm off to find replacement headphones!
customer_reviews.author: legalgirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gaming and Discord chat!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are so comfortable and have excellent sound quality. LED lights are just bright enough. Other headsets we tried had game sounds and feedback being broadcast to other players but these are perfect. Other players can hear you better when you speak too! Works great for hours of gaming and Discord chat. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Our 14 year old son bought these to replace his older gaming headphones. The sound quality blows the other headphones away. He is very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Bloch

product_meta.title: EKSA 7.1 USB Gaming Headset - Surround Stereo Sound - PS4 Headphones with Noise Canceling Mic & RGB Light Over Ear Headphones, Compatible with PC, PS4 Console, Laptop (Green)
product_meta.description: Color:GreenEKSA E1000 7. 1 Surround Stereo Sound Gaming Headset PS4 USB HeadphonesProfessional gaming headset for PC gamers, compatibility with PC (Win 7, Win 8, Win10), PS4 Console, laptops, Mac and other devices with USB audio port. EKSA gaming headset equip built-in USB audio sound chip with 7. 1 surround sound. Combine with 50mm magnetic neodymium driver, create an immersive gaming experience with stereo surround sound in the game. No driver required, Plug and Play. Designed for all-day comfort. With soft memory protein earmuffs on both side, you won't feel any discomfort while wearing this 7. 1 gaming headphones even for long time gaming. The headband was designed for balanced weight distribution and reduced clamping force to maximize comfort during lengthy gaming sessions. Features: 1. 【MULTI-PLATFORMCOMPATIBILITY】USB audio port devices. Supports PS4 Console , PC, Laptop, 32-bit & 64-bit Win7/Win8/Win8. 1/Win10/XP. 2. 7. 1 SURROUNDING SOUND With a premium 50MM neodymium driver, EKSA PS4 headset LED offersvivid surrounding sound field. 3. NOISE-CANCELING MIC: The 120° adjustable microphone can pick up voice with highsensitivity and isolate ambient noise effectively. 4. BUILT for COMFORT: The retractable headband and soft leather ear pad of the gameheadset provide personalized fit and the maximum comfort. 5. COOL LED Light: Create a glorious game atmosphere. Specifications: 1. Driver diameter: 50mm2. Impedance: 32 Ohm3. Sensitivity: 114dB +/- 3dB at 1KHz4. Frequency range: 20Hz-20KHz5. Micsensitivity: -36dB +/- 1dB6. Headset Cable: USB Cable7. Cable length: 2. 2M/7. 22 ft
feature_bullets: [Compatibility]: Professional gaming headset for PC gamers, compatibility with PC (Win 7, Win 8, Win10), PS4 Console, laptops, Mac and other devices with USB audio port.

[7. 1 Surround Sound]: EKSA gaming headset equip built-in USB audio sound chip with 7. 1 surround sound. Combine with 50mm magnetic neodymium driver, create an immersive gaming experience with stereo surround sound in the game. No driver required, Plug and Play.

[Noise-Cancelling Mic]: High sensitive microphone with omnidirectional noise reduction tech, reduces distracting background noise, to collect your voice clearly. And noise-cancelling micphone loud & high quality voice talks in game or online chat.

[Ergonomic design]: Designed for all-day comfort. With soft memory protein earmuffs on both side, you won't feel any discomfort while wearing this 7. 1 gaming headphones even for long time gaming. The headband was designed for balanced weight distribution and reduced clamping force to maximize comfort during lengthy gaming sessions. 2. 2m extremely durable cable, let you no longer be bound by short cable during your game!

[One Key Mute Function]: Easy-to-use volume adjustment and one key Mic mute switch, easy for your game operation, say goodbye to intricate control type adjustment. RGB gradient light, help to highlight the atmosphere of the game.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars992 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
